wikipedia_page.main: George Robertson (8 September 1915 – 24 January 2006) was a Scottish footballer, who played as a right half for Irvine Meadow, Kilmarnock and Scotland. He played in the 1938 Scottish Cup Final which Kilmarnock lost to East Fife after a replay.
